DOC.brief_summary: To estimate the effectiveness of Viscum album Homoeopathic mother tincture in Essential Hypertension by conducting clinical trial in moderate hypertensive patients for a period of six weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Viscum Album Mother Tincture as an Anti-hypertensive in Essential Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Hypertension at the range 180120 mm of Hg for Systole & 11080 mm of Hg for Diastole Patients who are on ACEI / ARB for Hypertension Diseases in which life expectancy is less than six months Secondary hypertension CHD Family History of Mental Illness like Anxiety or depression. Nasal Congestion
